definitions: the process of deciding or planning something

examples.text: the fixing of the date of the hearing
the fixing of a fair and reasonable price

shortDefinitions: action of deciding or settling on something

definitions: apparatus or equipment for a particular purpose
the ingredients necessary to make a dish or meal

examples.text: have all the fixings ready before starting

definitions: the action of fastening something in place

examples.text: the fixing of additional strengthening steelwork

shortDefinitions: action of fastening something in place

definitions: screws, bolts, or other items used to fix or assemble building material, furniture, or equipment.
shortDefinitions: items used to assemble furniture etc.

definitions: the action of mending or repairing something
shortDefinitions: action of mending or repairing something

definitions: the illegal or underhand influencing of the outcome of something such as a race, game, or election

examples.text: police investigating the alleged fixing of horse races
several laws restricted the fixing of retail prices

shortDefinitions: illegal or underhand influencing of something
